repositories.name: dashboard
repositories.description: ToolboxAI Dashboard Frontend - React 18 + Mantine v8 + Pusher
repositories.full_description:
# ToolboxAI Dashboard Frontend

Modern educational platform dashboard built with:

## Features
- **React 18** with TypeScript
- **Mantine v8.3.1** UI components
- **Pusher** real-time communication
- **Nginx** production server
- **Multi-service integration**

## Quick Start
```bash
docker run -p 5180:80 \
  -e VITE_PUSHER_KEY=your_key \
  -e VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://backend:8009 \
  toolboxai/dashboard:latest
```

## Environment Variables
- `VITE_PUSHER_KEY`: Pusher application key (required)
- `VITE_PUSHER_CLUSTER`: Pusher cluster (default: us2)
- `VITE_API_BASE_URL`: Backend API URL
- `VITE_ENABLE_PUSHER`: Enable real-time features (default: true)

## Documentation
- [Setup Guide](https://docs.toolboxai.solutions/setup)
- [API Documentation](https://docs.toolboxai.solutions/api)
- [Integration Guide](https://docs.toolboxai.solutions/integrations)

## Support
- GitHub: https://github.com/ToolBoxAI-Solutions/toolboxai
- Issues: https://github.com/ToolBoxAI-Solutions/toolboxai/issues
- Docs: https://docs.toolboxai.solutions

repositories.name: backend
repositories.description: ToolboxAI Backend API - FastAPI + Pusher + AI Services Integration
repositories.full_description:
# ToolboxAI Backend API

Comprehensive backend service for educational AI platform:

## Features
- **FastAPI** with Python 3.12
- **Pusher** server integration
- **PostgreSQL** database
- **Redis** caching
- **JWT** authentication
- **AI service coordination**
- **Educational content API**

## Quick Start
```bash
docker run -p 8009:8009 \
  -e DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/toolboxai \
  -e REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379 \
  -e PUSHER_KEY=your_pusher_key \
  toolboxai/backend:latest
```

## Environment Variables
- `DATABASE_URL`: PostgreSQL connection string
- `REDIS_URL`: Redis connection string
- `PUSHER_KEY`: Pusher application key
- `PUSHER_SECRET`: Pusher application secret
- `JWT_SECRET`: JWT signing secret

## API Documentation
Interactive API docs available at `/docs` endpoint when running.

## Health Checks
- Health endpoint: `/health`
- Database status: `/health/db`
- Redis status: `/health/redis`

repositories.name: mcp-server
repositories.description: ToolboxAI MCP Server - Model Context Protocol for AI coordination
repositories.full_description:
# ToolboxAI MCP Server

Model Context Protocol server for AI model coordination:

## Features
- **MCP Protocol** implementation
- **Multi-model** support
- **Context management**
- **Performance monitoring**
- **Real-time updates**

## Quick Start
```bash
docker run -p 9877:9877 \
  -e DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/toolboxai \
  toolboxai/mcp-server:latest
```

## Integration
Designed to work with ToolboxAI dashboard and agent coordinator for seamless AI model management.

repositories.description: ToolboxAI Agent Coordinator - AI agent orchestration and task management

# ToolboxAI Agent Coordinator

AI agent orchestration service:

## Features
- **Agent management**
- **Task distribution**
- **Real-time monitoring**
- **Result aggregation**
- **Performance tracking**

## Quick Start
```bash
docker run -p 8888:8888 \
  -e MCP_SERVER_URL=http://mcp-server:9877 \
  -e DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/toolboxai \
  toolboxai/agent-coordinator:latest
```

repositories.name: roblox-bridge
repositories.description: ToolboxAI Roblox Bridge - Educational game integration service
repositories.full_description:
# ToolboxAI Roblox Bridge

Roblox integration for educational gaming:

## Features
- **Roblox Studio** integration
- **Student progress** tracking
- **Educational content** sync
- **Real-time events**
- **Game session** management

## Quick Start
```bash
docker run -p 5001:5001 \
  -e DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/toolboxai \
  toolboxai/roblox-bridge:latest
```
